#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
    int t,n,m,i,x;
    ll res;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        res=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&x);
            res=(res+x+res*x)%m;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",res);
    }
    return 0;
}
